remarks.format: ## Examples 事务应用程序所使用的示例配置文件，如下所示，可以是An example configuration file used by your transaction application can be as follows, `` `` `` `` `` `` 此示例指定事务的默认值。This example specifies the default values of a transaction. 具体而言，它设置的计算机名称以及负责协调所有在本地，启动的分布式的事务的分布式事务处理协调器 (MSDTC) 后事务超时的默认时间。此外，它指定事务超时之前允许使用只能在计算机级别，这是最大时间量修改设置。Specifically, it sets the computer name of the Distributed Transaction Coordinator (MSDTC) that is responsible for coordinating all distributed transactions started locally, and the default time after which a transaction times out. In addition, it specifies a setting that can only be modified at the machine level, which is the maximum amount of time allowed before a transaction times out.
